bibl.title: Letter from Frances A. Hoffman to Laura Armistead Carter, [1925]

div1.p: Hoffman expresses sympathy upon the death of Henry Carter.

div1.head: Letter from Frances A. Hoffman to Laura Armistead Carter, [1925]
div1.p:
It was only yesterday
I learned of your great
loss in the death of
your dear father and
I would like you to
know how sad I
felt to hear this and
to know you will
no longer have him
with you.

I have always remembered
you as one of the most
unselfish and kind persons
I know and how good
you were to him when we
were in the Tropics.

The world has lost a most
wonderful man in your
father, but his name is
one many many will
remember -- for the able
work he did and for his
sweet gentle personality;
which he has imparted to
you Laura also-

I may go down to
Washington next spring and
if I do so I hope we may
see one another-
